message.body: Claude giroux is in my waiting room. Say whaaaa
Yah.
That's cray! Are you gonna be the one to register him?
It's his gf
His gf is going to register him?
OH! He's there bc of his gf?
Yeahh lol
Sooo I just realized that I might have my credit card info in the texts I donated. I don't remember. Maybe Charles' too...?
I just saw my email for Ed sheeran and I was like oh crap.
Cause you were buying tix and I needed his info so that the billing address wasn't the same. I might have sent him mine to buy something for me.
God damnit. Can I I donate them? Lol
Oh no! But why would you credit card info be sent through texts.
Okay. Ugh I wouldn't have caught it.. I would have skimmed. There's no order to the conversations, I can't find it lol
Ugh. Well if anything, tell them to reject me completely lol
I don't know man. I don't know.
It wouldn't change that the credit card number is on their system. Although hopefully it was a part of the what, 11, that didn't send?
Who knows. Hopefully they can remove it.
Oh thank goodness. If it's even in there.
I think I have to call discover again. They said I could look at the status of the dispute online, but when I do, it says I don't have any disputes.

Holy snaps. There was a math titration question that I have been angsting over because I missed that lab so I didn't know how to do it. I go to lab...wouldn't you know there's a problem and I MAGICALLY worked out how to do it! I even checked my answer using the equation we weren't supposed to use!
Thank you thank you!
